attributes.action: Investigate fully, and find true and accurate evidence that the Iranian government is supplying weapons or financial fudning to Iraqi insurgents or helping in any way to fuel terrorism in Iraq, and to address Parliment and make all details known to the members of the British Public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following reports emerging in the media that suggest Iran is fuelling Iraqi insurgents by supplying Iran made weapons, this is a petition to request that the United Kingdom Government will fully investigate and provide if found, any and all evidence, true or inaccurate, that the Iranian Government is directly responsible for supplying or helping in any way to fund, or fuel insurgency and/or Terrorism in Iraq. Further to this request, the Prime Minister or a member of the Cabinet will address Parliament and the members of the British Public throughout the investigation and provide such evidence or details should any be found.
